lexUnit.name: alcohol.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a colourless volatile flammable liquid which is the intoxicating constituent of wine, beer, spirits, etc.

sentence.text: The number of countries in Europe with a per capita intake of more than 10 litres of pure alcohol per year increased from 3 in 1950 to 18 by 1979 .
Epinephrine or pure alcohol was commonly used as the solution for injection for the arrest of peptic ulcer haemorrhage in the past 10 years .
But in all these instances total alcohol consumption ( measured in litres of pure alcohol , per capita ) is declining .
